summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Grading and Drainage Control Ordinance, amending Sections 22.800.080, 22.802.020, o30, 040, 050, 060, 070, 080, 090, 100, 22.804.030, 040, 050, 070, 080, 090, 100, 110, 120, 130, 140, 170, 180, 190, 200, 210, 220, 230, 240, 250, 260, 270, 280 22.806.010, 020, and 030; adding new Sections 22.800.090, 22.804.135 and 22.804.262, and repealing Sections 22.800.070, 22.802.010, 22.802.010, 22.804.020, 060, and 150 of the Seattle Municipal Code to clarify terms and responsibilities, conform to Master Use Permit criteria, modify standards and remove unnecessary terms and language.
